documentation.text:
@dev The _orderId param must be the block timestamp of the associated sendPayement fonction transaction
 @param _orderId The order id
@notice Call the claim function of FDLTTokenManager.sol contract

@notice Get the deposit amount locked in escrow contract waiting to transfer to caller
 @return uint the pending amount of caller

confirmDelivery(uint256).details: The _orderId param must be the block timestamp of the associated sendPayement fonction transaction

returns._0: uint the pending amount of caller

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendPayment(address,uint256).details: The _value param's unit must be in wei

params._seller: The address of the product seller

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimFDLTToken().notice: Call the claim function of FDLTTokenManager.sol contract

getDepositsOf().notice: Get the deposit amount locked in escrow contract waiting to transfer to caller

sendPayment(address,uint256).notice: Receives payments from buyer address and keep it in an escrow

setTokenManagerContractAddress(address).notice: Set a new FDLTTokenManager.sol contract address in case of updates
